Workflow.Name: Admin | Excuse Support Envts from Governance Flows
Workflow.Description: Listens for Support type environments to be added or updated in the inventory table, and excuses them from the Archival and Compliance flows in the Governance solution.

LocalizedName.description: Admin | Excuse Support Envts from Governance Flows

Description.description: Listens for Support type environments to be added or updated in the inventory table, and excuses them from the Archival and Compliance flows in the Governance solution.
